Title: Relates to permitting issuance of a marriage license application or marriage license to be performed utilizing audio-video technology
Summary: Permits issuance of a marriage license application or marriage license to be performed by a town or city clerk utilizing audio-video technology.
LawCode: Amd ยง13, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to permitting issuance of a marriage license application or marriage license to be performed utilizing audio-video technology
